Race.SpecificTitle: Columbia Heights Sewerage Dist. No. 1 -- 4.40 Mills Renewal - BOS - 20 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Columbia Heights Sewerage District No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Columbia Heights Sewerage District No. 1, Caldwell Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a four and forty hundredths (4.40) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Sewerage District (an estimated $116,160 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of twenty (20) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2037 for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and operating the sewers and sewerage disposal works and system of the District?
